name: IGS - Ital Gas Storage
technologies: Angular 5, Typescript, HTML, CSS, Java, Spring Boot, Spring Data, MSSQL, JHipster, Git
description: Web application for storing and distribution of gas in Italy
myWork: Developed microservices for adding new app features (file storage, user creation, administration, gas storage data microservices, tickets for maintaining app...). Development of RESTful web services(Spring Boot) for various data retrieving and manipulation requested by front-end side which I’ve done in Angular 5. Implementation of Angular smart tables for data representation, adding clone, editing data and graph filtering by time functionalities. Designed and implemented various chart representation of data using AmCharts.

name: Sapienza Utilities
description: Web application for managing bills for gas, electricity and water of University Sapienza, Rome
myWork: Working on Front-End side in Angular 6. Various data retrieving and manipulating requests. Implementation functionality for filtering bills and invoices, charts data representation, upload different types of files.

name: RAS - Internal company apps
technologies: Angular 6, Typescript, HTML, CSS, Java, MySQL
description: Internal company application that taking care of employees profiles, absenteeism, traveling costs and management of new applicants for jobs in company.
myWork: Working on maintaining and developing new features in this big system. Working on Front-End side in Angular 6. Development of REST APIs to support operations with database(PostgreSQL). Various data retrieving and manipulating requests.

name: Poly HUB4G
technologies: Angular 6, Typescript, RxJS, HTML, CSS, Jira, Git
description: Mobile and Desktop application that allows users to control the settings on audio devices like headsets and conference devices. Users can customize their ringtone and ring location, configure presence update and more
myWork: Development of services for various data retrieving and manipulation requested by front-end side which I’ve done in Angular 6. Creating functionalities for locating headset using Open Street Maps API and Google Maps API. Actively participated in creating UX and UI for the application

name: **classified**
description: Mobile and Desktop application for team communication which combines exchange of instant chat messages, videoconferencing, creating of a polls for the current call, content sharing, control of input and output devices as well as additional functionality like encryption of conference calls and more.
